New Records: Jokic's triple-double for the Nuggets was the first game of 20+p, 15+r, & 15+a in under 30 min in NBA history!
Key Match Events: Porter and Murray hit from 3-point range and Westbrook made a driving layup to quickly extend the lead to 84-75 in the first three minutes.
Denver took control with a dominant third quarter and extended their lead to 20 points with an 18-3 run that gave them a 20-point lead.
Jokic scored eight points in the final 3:48 and finished his night when he fed Peyton Watson for a layup for his 15th assist of the night.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter
The Hawks rallied from down nine early in the second quarter to lead 62-57 with 4:53 left in the period
